testcase.name: Login and buy product
testcase.system-out: Given Page 'https://mystore-testlab.coderslab.pl/' opened in browser2.......passed When Logged in..............................................................passed And MyStore clicked.........................................................passed And HUMMINGBIRD PRINTED SWEATER clicked.....................................passed And Discount checked........................................................passed And Size 'M' chosen.........................................................passed And Numbers 5 of item chosen................................................passed And Item added to cart......................................................passed And Proceed to checkout clicked.............................................passed And Proceed to checkout clicked2............................................passed And Continue clicked........................................................passed And Pick up in store chosen.................................................passed And Continue to payment clicked.............................................passed And Pay by check chosen, and agreed to terms................................passed And Place order clicked.....................................................passed Then Save screenshot........................................................passed Then Check if order have "Awaiting check payment" status, same price and same number.passed And Close browser2..........................................................passed
